changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.comment: Add the account for MSI based authentication to the reporting reader/writer role when running on Azure
changeSet.sql: IF (NOT EXISTS ( SELECT r.* from ( SELECT IS_ROLEMEMBER('REPORTING_READER_WRITER', '[${fffsWebPortalStagingDbMsiUsername}]') AS ROLE_MEMBER ) r WHERE r.ROLE_MEMBER > 0 )) ALTER ROLE REPORTING_READER_WRITER ADD MEMBER [${fffsWebPortalStagingDbMsiUsername}]

rollback.sql: IF (EXISTS ( SELECT r.* from ( SELECT IS_ROLEMEMBER('REPORTING_READER_WRITER', '[${fffsWebPortalStagingDbMsiUsername}]') AS ROLE_MEMBER ) r WHERE r.ROLE_MEMBER > 0 )) ALTER ROLE REPORTING_READER_WRITER DROP MEMBER [${fffsWebPortalStagingDbMsiUsername}]
